question: Which of the following pairs is correct?
option1: Mahatma Gandhi—Swaraj is my birth right
option2: Jawaharlal Nehru—Truth and nonviolence are my God
option4: Subhash Chandra Bose—Give me blood, I will give you freedom
answer: Subhash Chandra Bose—Give me blood, I will give you freedom
explanation: Bose\'s most famous quote was \"Give me blood, and I shall give you freedom!\" In this, he urged the people of India to join him in his fight against the British Raj. It was spoken by Subhas Chandra Bose as a part of a motivational speech for the Indian National Army at a rally of Indians in Burma on 4 July 1944.
